title: Scoring The Screen: Thomas Newman And the Music Of 'Shawshank'
teaser: Oscar-nominated composer Thomas Newman — whose credits include animated films like Finding Nemo and Wall-E to The Shawshank Redemption — kicks off our "Scoring the Screen" series with Robert Siegel.
